alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 27 at 1:58PM MST until February 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 4 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...For the current High Wind Warning, until 6 AM MST Monday. For the second High Wind Warning, from Noon Monday to 4 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing snow expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will decrease late overnight, then increase again Monday afternoon through Tuesday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Be aware of your vehicle`s crosswind limits.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
